text: Lorene Ren (; born 22 November 1988), previously known as Kirsten Ren, is a Taiwanese actress, model and singer. Her surname is sometimes spelled as Jen. She is the younger sister of Taiwanese girl group S.H.E member Selina Jen. Ren graduated from National Taiwan Normal University, with a bachelor's degree in home economics, human development and family studies. ==Early life== Lorene Ren was born on 22 November 1988, in Taipei, Taiwan. Her father, Milton Jen, used to be a technology company executive and now works as a part-time actor. Her mother is Zheng Ruilan, a homemaker. Selina爸中年失業 賣藝重生 . Retrieved 29 May 2015 Ren is the youngest of a two child family. Her older sister is Taiwanese girl group S.H.E member Selina Jen. Ren attended National Taiwan Normal University and graduated in 2011 with a bachelor's degree in home economics, human development and family studies. 任容萱師大畢業想學Selina置產 向爹討戀愛權 . Retrieved 29 May 2015 ==Career== ===Pre-debut=== In 2000, Taiwanese entertainment management agency HIM International Music held a "Universal 2000 Talent and Beauty Girl Contest" to search for new artistes, the winner of the contest would received a contract from HIM. Ren wanted to participate and had register in the contest, but was too young. Her older sister Selina entered the contest in her place and end up winning the contest. S.H.E生活的娱乐叙事 . Retrieved 29 May 2015 For the next few years Ren would then sometimes appear on variety shows as her sister guest, appear in other artistes music videos and also appear in commercial advertisements before officially debuting in 2009. ===Acting=== Ren made her acting debut in 2009 starring as the lead actress in GTV's fantasy idol drama K.O.3an Guo, which is a spin-off of the popular KO One drama franchise. 胡宇崴任容萱宣传偶像剧《终极三国》. Retrieved 30 May 2015 The drama took an entire year to film since it was split into 3 seasons with 53 episodes total. The drama helped her gain more exposure and soon she received more acting offers, usually starring as the lead or main cast. Her most acclaimed work to date is 2013 SETTV political themed idol drama In a Good Way. The drama was praised for its original storyline. Ren played "Lin Jia En" (林嘉恩), a country girl who wonders into the big city for fun but ends up meeting and falling for "Liu Shan Feng" (劉杉峰), played by Lego Lee, the most popular guy at a college from a strong political family during the 90's in Taiwan, Lego Lee and Kirsten Ren heat up Taiwanese drama, In a Good Way. Retrieved 30 May 2015 The drama received multi Golden Bell Awards nominations, including Best Drama at the 49th ceremony. . goldenbellawards nomination list. Retrieved 30 May 2015 The Pairing of Ren and Lee was also well received as the two won Best Screen Couple Award at the 2014 Sanlih Drama Awards. 2014華劇大賞／燈燈～完整得獎名單在此！. Retrieved 30 May 2015 ===Music=== Ren occasionally contributes to the soundtracks of the dramas she starred in. She first sang as part of the chorus for Danson Tang's single "When Together (愛在一起)", featured in his 2007 album Love Me.Love Me album info Love Me album info .
